divs: Sighting Detailswhile waiting with wife for ride to work for wife ,, i watched what i thought was plane on approch to airport ,, or maby mars , as it had a faint redish glow ,,,,, but it just slowly kept acending then all of a sudden , was gone lights went out or someting , like it whent into a door or something ,,, im 64 no drugs , im not deranged ,, was a shock to see.the light just went out zap gone and there was nothing to be seen in any direction ,,, yes were near the airport , was about 630 am sunrise ,,,, that is my report ,,,,, good day mmIII
Summary: saw riseing light at sunrise today ,, then light went out or it just was not there
